resources.string: Do you want to start Navigation to the "Pinned" location ?
Sorry, i could not find a Location yet.
Map Downloads are only availible in Online mode !
H1keMaps runs now in Offline mode !
H1keMaps runs now in Online mode !

This Application is written by Konstantin Hamm with some code passages from the Skobbler Maps Team(Telnav GmbH, Berlin, Germany). If you are interested in the Skobbler Maps SDK please visit http://www.skobbler.de/apps.
H1keMaps was written in the context of a Bachelors Thesis for Prof. Dr. Walter Roth and Dipl.-Inf Uwe Gogolin as second examiner. Both reviewers are a part of the computer science department of the University of Applied Sciences in Iserlohn, Germany. 



How to use H1keMaps ?


If you slide your finger from the left edge of the map to the middle a navigation drawer will appear. From here on out you can navigate through the H1keMaps app.


Find Me !

 This button will show you where you are. 


Download Offline Maps

 This button will open a new window where you can download map data to use them if you are hiking do not have a reliable data connection. Caution! Only works in online mode !


Toggle Maps On/Offline

 This button toggles the online or offline mode. 


Start / Stop Navigation to Pin

 To navigate to a location you first have to "pin" it. That means press and hold that location for a short while until a pin appears on the map. Then you have to press the navigation button. After that the app will start to navigate to the location of the last( ! ) added pin.


Change Mapstyle

 As the name suggests this button will change the map style.


Clear Pins

 This buttons will delete all pins and hikeRoutes


Toggle Compass On/Off

 This button will toggle the compass on or off.


Toggle Heading

 With this button you can toggle the heading mode on or off - independent from the compass.
Download has started. Please do not close the application
Caution! The Screen stays now On. This will consume a lot of your battery power !
The Screen will now behave normal and turn off after a couple of seconds.
